name: Dice Wars v0.1
description:
IN DEVELOPMENT

Please use the following link to give us feedback:

Google Form - Dice Wars v0.1 Feedback

How to Play
  • Use WASD and left mouse button to move the camera
  • Use the right mouse button to rotate the camera
  • Use the mouse wheel to zoom
  • At the start of the level select the dice you want to use
  • After the start, flick them and use their abilities to defeat all enemies
  • Don't forget to use the re-flick of the dice
